entityType.description: Unique identification of an entity. (NL: De unieke identificatie van een entiteit.)

afdDefinitionName.description: Name of the AFD-definition. (NL: De AFD definitienaam van o.a. webservices en verzekeringsproducten.)
afdDefinitionName.customDescription: Name of the AFD-definition, refers to the Feedback message itself.

afdDefinitionVersion.description: Version of the AFD-definition. (NL: Met AFD definitieversienummer wordt aangegeven over welke versie van de (product)definitie wordt gecommuniceerd.)
afdDefinitionVersion.customDescription: Version of the AFD-definition, refers to the Feedback message itself.

originalMessageId.description: The messageId of the original message, which is replaced by this message. (NL: MessageId van het oorspronkelijke bericht, dat wordt vervangen door dit bericht.)
originalMessageId.customDescription: The commonTechnical.messageID of the original message for which the status and/or errors are being sent to the Feedback endpoint.

statusType.customDescription: Status of the proccessing of the original message for which the status and/or errors are being sent to the Feedback endpoint. Message statuses are either 'Accepted (8 - Geaccepteerd)' or 'Not Accepted (0 - Afgewezen).

entityType.description: Unique identification of an entity. (NL: De unieke identificatie van een entiteit.)

creationDateTime.description: Creation date and time (as timestamp) of the (for example) message, system or file. (AFD 2.0 only)
creationDateTime.customDescription: Creation datetime of the Feedback message itself.

messageId.description: Unique identification of the message. (AFD 2.0 only)
messageId.customDescription: Unique identification of the Feedback message itself.

testMessage.description: Indication whether the message is a test message. (NL: Indicatie of sprake is van een testbericht.)

entityType.description: Unique identification of an entity. (NL: De unieke identificatie van een entiteit.)

refKey.description: Unique reference key assigned to an entity. (NL: Entiteitsreferentie is een unieke referentie sleutel die aan een entiteit wordt toegekend.)

errorCodeExplanation.description: Explanation of the error message. (NL: Toelichting op de soort foutmelding.)

entityType.description: Unique identification of an entity. (NL: De unieke identificatie van een entiteit.)

organizationName.description: Name of professional or branch organization. (NL: Naam beroeps of branche organisatie.)
organizationName.customDescription: party.pensionProvider.organizationName of the original message for which the status and/or errors are being sent to the Feedback endpoint .

puvCode.customDescription: party.pensionProvider.puvCode of the original message for which the status and/or errors are being sent to the Feedback endpoint
